system.description:
Upon reaching 2,100,000 XP, a Halfling gains resistance to breath weapons, including dragon breath and other breath-based attacks. They automatically take half damage from such effects, and if a saving throw is allowed, a successful save further reduces the damage to one-quarter.

As with magic resistance, fractions are rounded down, and any final damage of Â½ a point or less results in 1 point of damage taken.
